compilations.name: Delicious Soups To Keep You Warm This Season

compilations.description: Looking for simple, easy-to-make one-pot dinner recipes? Start with these! You choose from a cheesy mushroom bacon risotto or paprika chicken rice bake depending on what you’re craving. They’re perfect dinner options which will keep you full and fueled for hours. If you're vegetarian or vegan, no problem. You can always swap meat with the vegetable of your choice, or even tofu. Let's eat!
compilations.name: One-Pot Dinners

compilations.description: Winters call for a warm and soothing soup. But, why settle for just one when we’ve curated 25 mouthwatering soup recipes to excite your tastebuds. Start with our crowd-pleasing Hearty Chicken Tortilla Soup and gorge your way through the vegan Healthy and Hearty Black Bean Soup the next day.
compilations.name: 25 Soup Recipes

compilations.description: Looking for simple, easy-to-make meal recipes? Start with these! You can serve them with just about anything, and you can switch up the flavors — like a Filipino-Style One-Pot Chicken Adobo or One-Pot Chicken Teriyaki With Rice — depending on what you’re craving. They’re the perfect meal for a busy day and are ready to eat in no time.
compilations.name: One Pot Recipes For Us Lazy People

compilations.description: Are you a broccoli fan? If so, we've got a bunch of broccoli recipes that're quick, easy, tasty, and are perfect for a special day! Start with a Broccoli Cheddar Soup or try an impressive Broccoli Ham and Cheddar Chicken Roll. Sit down to your favorite movie, pour yourself a drink, and settle in for a stay-at-home movie night that’s the best blend of comfort and culinary deliciousness.
compilations.name: 'Broc' n 'Roll' With These Broccoli Recipes

compilations.description: Who says soups are only for when you're sick? We've got the perfect soup recipes for every occasion. Whip up our flavor-packed Taco Soup for a refreshing punch. Need a delicious soup to start off a fancy dinner party? Test out our favorite, Panera's claim to fame, a cheesy Broccoli Cheddar! The hardest part? Picking out which soup to try. Try 'em out and choose your favorite!
compilations.name: Soups For Every Occasion

compilations.description: We know you miss the Panera Bread experience – we all do! That's why we're bringing Panera Bread to you. Our one-pot broccoli cheddar soup is oh-so-creamy and delicious, and our four-cheese mac and cheese will earn you your own Tik-Tok fame. Craving their salad? Our mixed berry spinach salad with strawberry vinaigrette dressing have got you covered. These recipes are wholesome and hearty, just like the real deal.
compilations.name: Homemade Panera Bread Recipes

compilations.description: Nobody likes doing the dishes, especially after a long day at work. That's why we're bringing you meals that fully come together in just one single pot. If you're looking for a fancy night of indulgence, give our mouthwatering One-Pot Chicken Bacon & Goat Cheese Pasta a try, and if that's not enough, try the spicy One-Pot Chicken Chow Mein! The best part? You can eat things straight out of the pot: we won't tell.
compilations.name: One-Pot Recipes For Those Who Hate Doing Dishes

compilations.description: We LOVE cheese (who doesn't?) and we know you do too, so we've rounded up some recipes that'll celebrate that cheese adoration. Use your Hot Cheetos and make yourself a delicious Hot Cheeto Burrito, oozing with cheese. Stuff the cheese in some mashed potatoes, fry it, and watch the lovely pull you'll get, or go the classic route and add a lot of it to your mac and cheese. The possibilities are endless and dang, are they cheesi-licious.
compilations.name: Cheesy Recipes You Just Need

compilations.description: If you're a vegetarian that wants to eat gourmet, well, now you can – no compromises. We bring to you, the fanciest, most delicious vegetarian gourmet recipes! Try a layered beauty like the Mushroom Wellington and — if that's not enough — try out our green and gorgeous Cauliflower Gnocchi. You know what time it is? It is time to 'make it fancy!'
compilations.name: Gourmet Recipes That Are Vegetarian

compilations.description: Looking for soup recipes to warm you up on a cold night? Try a classic like our vegetable dumpling soup that will instantly take you back to your childhood, or soothe your soul with our warm tomato basil soup. Get under your cozy blanket and slurp your heart out!
compilations.name: Soup Recipes That Will Immediately Make You Feel Better

compilations.description: Broccoli's having its moment — and we're here for it. Choose from an array of broccoli-laden goodies, from our broccoli cheddar soup to some melt-in-your-mouth beef and broccoli-stuffed rice triangles. These recipes are super easy to make, delicious at any hour of the day and perfect for your next game night.
compilations.name: Broccoli Recipes That Taste Bomb

compilations.description: You don't have to be a master chef to make amazing meals with cheese. Cheese is an ingredient that few people can resist; it's simple but always adds that extra something special! Why not make some delicious Cheesy Chicken Balls , or try our famous One-Pot Broccoli Cheddar Soup ? After all, everything is better with cheese!
compilations.name: Everything Is Better With Cheese!

compilations.description: Broccoli is one of the most versatile vegetables out there. And we’re here to show you all it can do in these mouthwatering recipes. Try our oh-so-comforting Creamy Broccoli Soup, lip-smacking Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry, or satisfying Cheesy Chicken Broccoli Bake!
compilations.name: 5 Recipes That Will Make You Love Broccoli

results.description: This easy and comforting soup is made in one pot with fresh broccoli, sharp cheddar cheese, and a handful of simple ingredients for a delicious and hearty meal.

instructions.display_text: Trim the stems off of the broccoli heads, then chop into small florets.

Melt the butter in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onion and sauté until translucent, about 5 minutes. Add the flour and stir until the mixture lightly browns, 2–3 minutes. Pour in the half-and-half and cook, stirring constantly, until simmering. Reduce the heat to low and add the vegetable stock. Bring to a simmer and cook for 5–10 minutes, until thickened.
Mix in the broccoli, carrots, salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Simmer for 10–15 minutes, until the vegetables are tender. Add the cheese and stir until it melts and combines with the other ingredients.
Ladle the soup into bowls and serve warm.
Enjoy!

results.name: One-Pot Broccoli Cheddar Soup

tips_summary.content:
• Reduce the amount of salt for a less salty soup 🧂
• Mix the cream and broth together for a smoother texture 🥛
• Add more cheese for a bolder flavor 🧀
• Use less cheese to avoid a grainy texture 🧀
• Add garlic for an extra kick of flavor 🧄

Try 'em out and choose your favorite!
compilations.name: Soups For Every Occasion

results.description: This quick and easy taco soup is made entirely in one pot in less than 30 minutes. Topped with cheese, avocado, and all the fixins, this simple soup makes the perfect weeknight dinner that'll please just about anyone.

instructions.display_text: Add the ground beef and onion to a large pot and stir until the beef is cooked through.
Drain excess liquid.
Add the kidney beans, black beans, corn, tomatoes, tomato sauce, and taco seasoning to the pot, and stir until combined.
Cook over medium heat for 10 minutes.
Serve with cheddar cheese, sour cream, pico de gallo, avocado, corn chips, lime wedges, and cilantro.
Enjoy!

results.name: Taco Soup

compilations.name: Delicious Soups To Keep You Warm This Season

compilations.description: Looking for simple, easy-to-make soups to warm you up on a cold night? Try a classic like chicken noodle soup to instantly take you back to childhood, or even the cream of mushroom soup — which is just as delicious. You can't go wrong with any of these options, and you'll definitely go back for seconds!
compilations.name: 6 Soups to Warm You Up!

compilations.description: Winters call for a warm and soothing soup. But, why settle for just one when we’ve curated 25 mouthwatering soup recipes to excite your tastebuds. Start with our crowd-pleasing Hearty Chicken Tortilla Soup and gorge your way through the vegan Healthy and Hearty Black Bean Soup the next day.
compilations.name: 25 Soup Recipes

Try 'em out and choose your favorite!

compilations.description: You're in your 20s and faced with the realities of life. One of those harsh ones? The need to feed. Luckily for you, we've got 30 recipes to master before you're 30: the perfect way to feed yourself. Learn how to make a great glaze for your Pork Chops, how you should cook a Steak In Garlic Butter just to your liking, or something even simpler: a perfect batch of Cookies. The ball's in your court, and so are the delicious eats.
compilations.name: 30 Recipes To Learn Before You Turn 30

compilations.description: When you have mushroom on hand, you're always just minutes away from a great meal. For a delicious weeknight recipe, whip up some garlic parmesan stuffed mushroom paired with a one-pot chicken mushroom pasta. Or, simply whip up some comforting cream of mushroom soup! Or get a taste of Japan with this Japanese arancini. The options are endless!
compilations.name: Mushrooms 18 Ways

compilations.description: There are some recipes any cook should have in their arsenal, whether you're a beginner or a seasoned professional. These recipes are easy to follow and easy to master, so get ready to impress your friends, family, and everyone one you meet! From Fudgy Brownies to Chinese Chicken Fried Rice , you'll have these dishes down by heart in no time!
compilations.name: Recipes You Should Know By Now

compilations.description: Now that wintertime is here and the weather is getting colder everyday, it's time to snuggle up under your blanket, light up some scented candles, put on your favorite Netflix show, and enjoy a warm, comforting bowl of soup! Ah, it just sounds so relaxing! A nice, warm bowl of good soup (thanks, Adam Driver) can really brighten anyone's mood! Try our creamy Tomato Soup with Grilled Cheese Croutons, or our hearty Cream of Mushroom Soup! Indulge in our top soup recipes to make this winter the coziest one yet!
compilations.name: Soups For The Soul

results.description: Smacking with savory flavor, and creamy in texture, this soup will have you wishing for an endless winter. It’s essentially composed of mushrooms, heavy cream, flour, and a few vegetables, meaning anyone can make it on short notice and with a tight budget. Serve with a crusty bread, and top with fresh parsley as desired.

instructions.display_text: In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, melt the butter, then add the onion and saute until translucent, 3 minutes. Add the garlic and stir, then cook for 1 more minute.
Add the mushrooms, salt, and pepper and cook until they begin to turn golden brown, about 5 minutes.
Add the flour and stir to coat the mushrooms, until combined.
Add the white wine, stir, and cook until combined, about 1 minute.
Add the vegetable stock, stir, and simmer for 15 minutes.
Add the heavy cream and stir to combine.
Blend soup to your desired consistency with an immersion blender or standing blender.
Serve hot, garnished with parsley.
Enjoy!

results.name: Cream Of Mushroom Soup

compilations.name: Vegan Versions Of Your Favourite Fast Foods
One-Pot Meals For Any Night Of The Week

compilations.description: Eating a vegetarian diet isn't always easy, and meal planning can easily feel like a chore. Luckily, we've got one vegetarian meal picked out for every day of the week. Start Monday off with an amazing mushroom burger that’s loaded with cheese. Later in the week, enjoy a comforting meatless meal of stuffed butter nut squash. See, this whole eating vegetarian thing doesn't have to be a bore.
compilations.name: 7 Days, 7 Vegetarian Meals

compilations.description: All hail the vegan variety hour! Here's a highlight reel of delicious recipes that happen to be vegan. From a quick Chickpea Salad Sandwich to a hearty Eggplant Potato Tomato Stew, Tasty is bringing deliciously amazing recipes to all our vegan fans.
compilations.name: Vegan Variety Hour

compilations.description: End the year with a culinary big bang! 2022 is coming to an end, but your nights shouldn't without tasting these delicious recipes. We have got Baked Lobster Tails, Creamy Tuscan Chicken, Korean-Style BBQ Beef, or a 20-Minute One-Pan Pizza to cover all of your cravings. Are you convinced or should we go on?
compilations.name: Tasty Dinners for Every Night of December

results.description: This comforting and hearty soup is a delicious twist on a classic Italian dish. Packed with tender pasta, rich tomato sauce, and nutritious spinach and lentils, this soup is the perfect way to warm up on a chilly day.

instructions.display_text: In a large pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook for 3-4 minutes, until semi-translucent.
Add the garlic, tomato paste, basil, and oregano, and cook for 2-3 more minutes, or until the onions are translucent and herbs are fragrant.
Add the crushed tomatoes, vegetable broth, and lentils, and bring to a boil. Increase heat to medium-high and cook for 10 minutes or until lentils are halfway tender.
Break apart the lasagna noodles into about 2-inch-long (5-cm) pieces and add to the pot. Let the soup cook for another 10-15 minutes, or until the pasta is al dente and the lentils are tender.
Stir in the spinach and let wilt, then serve immediately.
Enjoy!

results.name: Vegan Lasagna Soup

compilations.description: We don’t know about you, but whenever it’s raining outside, the only thing we crave is indulgent comfort food. Whether you’re in the mood for a straight-forward grilled cheese, a steaming bowl of curry noodle soup ready in under 30 minutes, or a hands-off slow-cooker meal like this turkey chili with cornbread dumplings, these recipes will fill your body and soul with warmth on any cold rainy night.
compilations.name: Rainy Day Dishes
One-Pot Meals For Any Night Of The Week

compilations.description: Slurp slurp slurp! Don't you love this sound? These slurpy noodles recipes are perfect for all you noodle lovers. Our garlic veggie noodles are packed with flavor and one-pot chicken chow mein is an all-time favorite. Finally, test out our delicious Vietnamese chicken pho and let us know which one you liked best!
compilations.name: Slurp These Noodles Away!

compilations.description: For sugar, spice, and everything that's pungent and nice, look no further than punchy ginger. The peppery-yet-sweet flavor is just to die for. We love it in our shrimp stir fry and also in a Thai-inspired peanut noodle pasta salad. If you're looking for some international recipes, try out our take on some homemade lumpia or a Hainanese chicken rice – ginger is really the star. Clear your sinuses and cleanse your palate with these ginger-forward delights!
compilations.name: Add Some Spice To Your Life With These Ginger Recipes

compilations.description: Who doesn't crave comfort food after a long day at work or school? From cozy, homemade hot chocolate to our favorite cheeseburger sliders we've got something for everyone. These comfort foods always hit the spot.
compilations.name: Comfort Food Recipes
Recipes You Should Learn If You Love Noodles

results.description: This deliciously fragrant soup is a perfect blend of savory flavors. Tender noodles and vegetables are simmered in a fragrant curry broth, resulting in a comforting and satisfying meal that's perfect for any occasion.

instructions.display_text: In a large pot, melt the coconut oil over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the garlic and ginger and cook for 2-3 minutes, until fragrant.
Add the red curry paste and cook for another 2-3 minutes, until aromatic and the garlic and ginger are well-coated.
Add the coconut milk and stir well until the curry paste is evenly distributed. Add the vegetable broth and bring to a boil.
Once boiling, add the agave and rice noodles and cook for 2 minutes, stirring frequently to prevent the noodles from sticking together.
Add the tofu, broccoli, and bell pepper, and stir to combine. Cook for 3-5 more minutes, until the noodles are cooked and the broccoli is tender.
Stir in the lime juice and season with salt to taste.
Garnish with cilantro and serve immediately.
Enjoy!

results.name: Curry Noodle Soup

compilations.description: We don’t know about you, but whenever it’s raining outside, the only thing we crave is indulgent comfort food. compilations.description: Everyone loves chicken, and these are the best of our recipes! Pick one from the lot, be it either the chicken chow mein or the feta and spinach stuffed chicken pie. These recipes will delight everyone's taste buds and keep you craving even more. So what are you waiting for? Grab your spice box and let's get cookin' shall we?
compilations.name: Tasty's Favorite Chicken Recipes!

compilations.description: Sometimes a craving hits, and you just don't know why. If you'd like to recreate the Chick-fil-A experience at home, we've got your back. This Chicken Cobb Salad is just as good, and the Chicken Ranch wrap is almost as easy to whip up as hitting the drive-thru. The Chicken Noodle Soup will hit all the right spots and the Buttermilk Fried Chicken sandwich won't disappoint either. It's chicken time in your household!
compilations.name: Homemade Chick-Fil-A Recipes
Recipes For When It's Raining Outside

compilations.description: Nothing spells Sunday like comfort foods galore, and with the perfect weekend plan, we know you need some ideas. Soothe your soul with our flavorful Chicken Noodle Soup, or add a crispy touch to your menu with our Fish Tacos! Take a glance and tell us: what's your pick?
compilations.name: Sunday Special Meals
Recipes For When You're Reading Your Favorite Book

compilations.description: Fall's here, which means it's time to make steaming hot bowls of soup! Curl up with a cozy blanket and some Tomato Soup with Grilled Cheese Croutons. Nothing screams comfort food more than a bowl of Chicken Noodle Soup. On days when you just want to have an easy meal, stir up some Homemade Alphabet Soup. This fall, fall in love with soups!
compilations.name: Cozy Soups For The Fall

compilations.description: Now that wintertime is here and the weather is getting colder everyday, it's time to snuggle up under your blanket, light up some scented candles, put on your favorite Netflix show, and enjoy a warm, comforting bowl of soup! Ah, it just sounds so relaxing! A nice, warm bowl of good soup (thanks, Adam Driver) can really brighten anyone's mood! Try our creamy Tomato Soup with Grilled Cheese Croutons, or our hearty Cream of Mushroom Soup! Indulge in our top soup recipes to make this winter the coziest one yet!

instructions.display_text: In a large pot, melt butter and add onions and garlic. Cook until onions have begun to soften.
Add celery, carrots, and cooked shredded chicken.
Add the chicken broth, egg noodles, salt, pepper and bay leaves.
Bring to a boil and then reduce heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Remove bay leaves from the soup.
Enjoy!

compilations.description: Do you have crazy work hours and need something to lift your spirits? We're happy to help! We've carefully selected a list of low-lift recipes that will bring a smile on your face! Need a quick boost of serotonin, test out the Cheeseburger Sliders and if that's not enough, try the Homemade Broccoli Cheese Soup! Test 'em out and don't forget to pick your favorites!
compilations.name: Comfort Foods After A Long Day At Work

compilations.description: If you're feeling meh about broccoli, we're here to change your mind. This vegetable is so versatile and tasty. Turn broccoli into a comforting main dish like our ham and cheddar chicken roll. We promise you won't even notice the vegetables. Or try your hand at this chicken alfredo lasagna roll, a hit with adults and kids alike. Right this way to broccoli bliss.
compilations.name: Make Broccoli Actually Taste Good

results.description: This comforting, classic soup is made with fresh broccoli, sharp cheddar cheese, and a touch of cream for a velvety texture that will warm you up from the inside out.

instructions.display_text: Over medium heat, combine cheese with cornstarch and cayenne pepper.
Once melted, slowly add garlic, milk, and chicken stock.
Add finely chopped broccoli and allow to simmer about 5 minutes while making cheese toasts.
Cover slices of baguette bread with shredded cheddar and broil for 3 minutes.
Enjoy!

results.name: Homemade Broccoli Cheese Soup

results.description: Dive into a mouthwatering medley of shredded chicken, hearty beans, and zesty spices, all swimming in a rich, soul-warming broth. This tortilla soup is your ticket to a fiesta of flavor that'll have you shouting, "Olé!"

instructions.display_text: In a medium sauce pot over a medium heat, add oil, garlic and onion. Cook until onion starts to become translucent.
Add tomatoes, green chiles, black beans, corn, salt, pepper, oregano, cumin, and chili powder. Cook until all ingredients are heated through, stirring occasionally.
Add broth, stir and bring to a simmer.
Add chicken and allow to heat through.
Serve with a sprinkle of tortilla strips and cilantro.
Enjoy!

tips_summary.content:
• Add more seasoning to enhance the flavor 🌶️🧂
• Try different types of beans for variety 🌰
• Incorporate cream cheese, lime juice, and avocado for a creamy twist 🧀🥑
• Use homemade chicken broth or rotisserie chicken for added flavor 🍗
• Add more tomatoes or broth to make the soup more substantial 🍅🍲

compilations.description: Think broccoli is pretty basic? We're here to change your mind. We're upgrading the broccoli-cheddar classic combo with our Broccoli Cheddar Quiche that's perfect for any time of the day! If that doesn't quite squash your cravings, end your night with a heaping bowl of Creamy Broccoli Soup. So, are you ready to 'broc' n' roll?!
compilations.name: Everything You Can Cook With Broccoli

compilations.description: Broccoli is one of the most versatile vegetables out there. And we’re here to show you all it can do in these mouthwatering recipes. Try our oh-so-comforting Creamy Broccoli Soup, lip-smacking Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry, or satisfying Cheesy Chicken Broccoli Bake!
compilations.name: 5 Recipes That Will Make You Love Broccoli

results.description: Cozy up with this Creamy Broccoli Soup that's bursting with flavor and packed with nutrients. This velvety smooth soup is perfect for a chilly day and will have you coming back for seconds!

instructions.display_text: Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook for 3-4 minutes, until semi-translucent. Add the garlic, salt, and pepper and cook for 2-3 minutes more, until the garlic is fragrant.
Add the mashed potatoes, broccoli, vegetable broth, and milk and bring to a boil. Cover and reduce the heat to low. Simmer for 20 minutes, or until the broccoli is tender.
Use an immersion blender to blend the soup until smooth.
Stir in the nutmeg, then ladle into bowls.
Enjoy!

results.name: Creamy Broccoli Soup

components.raw_text: 2 small heads broccoli, including stems, chopped

Recipes For When It's Snowing Outside
compilations.thumbnail_alt_text: Recipes For When It's Snowing Outside

compilations.description: The tomato plant is the most popularly cultivated plant around the world, grown in gardens, on farms, and in greenhouses. It is also an oft-overlooked ingredient in many food recipes. Well, not anymore! We are putting the spotlight on the tomato. And what better way to do so than to try out Tomato Basil Soup or href="https://tasty.co/recipe/easy-tomato-basil-pasta-bake"> Easy Tomato Basil Pasta Bake ? So what are you waiting for? Give the tomato the love it deserves!
compilations.name: All Things Tomato!

results.description: Dive into a bowl of this comforting Tomato Basil Soup that's bursting with flavor! It's the perfect dish to warm you up on a chilly day, and it's so easy to make, you'll be whipping it up in no time.

instructions.display_text: Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onion, celery, and garlic and sauté for 3 minutes, until the onion is translucent.
Add the salt, pepper, tomato paste, basil, crushed tomatoes, veggie broth, baking soda, and thyme. Bring to a boil.
Reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15 minutes.
Uncover and remove thyme.
Use an immersion or countertop blender to blend the soup until smooth. Let cool for 2 minutes.
Ladle the soup into bowls and garnish with more basil.
Enjoy!

results.name: Tomato Basil Soup
